Uses of Interface
onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.players.utilityfunction.Utility_Function

  • Packages that use Utility_Function 
    Package Description
    onetomany
    One-to-Many package is dedicated to one-to-many negotiation which is a kind of negotiation different from bilateral and multilateral settings.
    onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.players
    Each user would enjoy a rational assistant agent to make one-to-many negotiation on his or behalf in Bargaining Chips Game.
    onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.players.utilityfunction
    This package is devoted to the Utility Function interface and all the classes for different definitions of utility functions.

    • Uses of Utility_Function in onetomany

    • Uses of Utility_Function in onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.players.utilityfunction

      Classes in onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.players.utilityfunction that implement Utility_Function 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  UF_75pQtyOrNothing
      If 75 percent of the stacks be satisfied regarding the quantity as long as the total price would be less than the total price of the wishlist, bundle b would be evaluated as 1.0, otherwise as 0.0.
      class  UF_AllOrNothing
      If all requested quantities at the total requested price (or less) would be satisfied, then the bundle is evaluated as 1.0, otherwise as 0.0;
      class  UF_FreeDisposal
      While the total price of the bundle b is less that that of the wishlist, it evaluates the bundle as 1.0 if quantity of all stacks in b is equal or more than that of the stack of the same color in wishlist; since under free disposal it doesn't cost to receive extra quantities.
      class  UF_IWant3Red
      This utility function simply implements a hardheaded behavior which evaluates as 1 any bundle which includes a stack with 3 Red chips, and 0, otherwise.
      class  UF_IWantColorAndQuantity
      This utility function simply implements a hardheaded behavior which evaluates as 1 any bundle which includes a stack with chips in specific color c and quantity q, and 0, otherwise
      class  UF_Nice
      This happy utility function is Okay with any bundle, evaluates everything as 1.0
      class  UF_prcntQTYandprcntPrice
      If p1 percent of the stacks regarding quantity and p2 percent of total price of the bundle be satisfied compared to the total price of the wishlist, bundle b would be evaluated as 1.0, otherwise as 0.0.
      class  UF_Silly
      This silly utility function evaluates any bundle as 0.0
      class  UF_SimpleAdditive
